properties.entry: SELECT SENDER_NO , RECEIVER_NO , MEM_NO , NICKNAME , PROFILE_PIC FROM FRIEND JOIN MEMBER ON (RECEIVER_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE SENDER_NO = ? AND REQUEST_STATUS = 'A' UNION SELECT SENDER_NO , RECEIVER_NO , MEM_NO , NICKNAME , PROFILE_PIC FROM FRIEND JOIN MEMBER ON (SENDER_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE RECEIVER_NO = ? AND REQUEST_STATUS = 'A';
